蘠字的基本解释

蘠
qiáng
〔蘠蘼（
m?）〕蔷薇。

蘠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiáng］
［《廣韻》在良切，平陽，從。］
(1)见“東蘠”。
(2)见“治蘠”。
(3)同“薔”。参见“蘠蘼”。
(4)通“牆”。

蘠字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蘠； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1069第24
【集韻】【韻會】?慈良切，音戕。【說文】蘠蘼。【爾雅·釋草】蘠蘼。【疏】一名虋冬。　又【唐韻】同薔。【爾雅·釋草】蔱薔。【疏】蔱蘠，今作?䕋，字之誤也。　又治蘠，見菊字註。　又【韻會】東蘠。見薔字註。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋草】蘠蘼。【注】一名虋冬。〕　謹照原文注改疏。
蘠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蘠字的起名意思

暂无。

蘠

蘠
qiáng
〔蘠蘼(
m?)] Rose.
蘠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiáng］
["Guangyun" is in Liangqie, Pingyang, Cong. ]
(1) See "Dongpan".
(2) See "Governance".
(3) Same as "Qiang". See "蘠蘼".
(4) Through the "wall".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蘠; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1069 Page 24
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Kindly cut, sound wary. [Said the text] Bian Bian. 【Erya·Shucao】Certainly. [Sparse] A Qidong.　[Tang Yun] The same Qiang. 【Erya·Shucao】Lian Qiang. 【Sparse】蔱蘠, this is what? P, the word is also wrong.　Heal again, see the note on chrysanthemum.　[Rhyme Club] Dong Pan. See note on rose character. Textual research: [[Erya·Shucao] Bian Bian. [Note] A Qidong. 〕 　 I would like to change the note based on the original text.
